author: bencomic

left.text: I hope when your grandma dies, or when you fall in love with someone you've only ever met on the Internet, that people treat you like you treated JohnK.
I will probably ask Kom or someone to upload any games I make from now on, or release them on the MZXIRC forums.

right.text: You forgot to mention how the community is made up of utter cunts. P.S. I had already left but I decided it was important to say this. You cunts.

left.text: I am not leaving Komment Games (unless Kom kicks me out). BrahMatt is dead. I will probably release SquareMZX r3 on the MZXIRC forums (http://compy386. whatisnotmyip.com /forums).

title: he'll be back within a month, part 4
